title: CHORIZO MEATBALLS A LA CACIQUE
directions: To make the meatballs, place all the ingredients into a large bowl. Using your hands, blend the ingredients thoroughly and make balls the size of a golf ball or any size you prefer. Refrigerate until needed.
Place the meatballs on a cookie sheet and bake for about 20 minutes or until the meatballs are cooked all the way through.
To make Chipotle Honey Cream: blend Crema Mexicana Agria, chipotle peppers with Adobo sauce, and honey. Allow to rest in refrigerator. When ready to serve, spread sauce on bun.
